subject: Economy
question_en: What is the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in 2020-21?
question_hi: 2020-21 में भारत का ग्रॉस डोमेन प्रतिक्रमा (GDP) क्या था?
explanation_en: The Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in the fiscal year 2020-21 was Rs. 266.6 trillion. The GDP is the total value of goods and services produced within a country's borders during a specific time period. In the given options, answer B provides the closest approximation to the actual GDP figure.
explanation_hi: भारत के वर्षीय वर्ष 2020-21 में भारत का ग्रॉस कामयों और सम्पदों कामयों कामयों कामयों, क्यामयों 2020-21 के वर्षीय में 266,600,000,000,000 रूपयों सम्पदयों कामयों, क्याम्पदयों कामयों, क्याम्पदयों, कामयों 2020-21 के वर्षीय में
D_en: The GDP (Gross Domestic Product) of India in the fiscal year of 2020-21 was Rs. 266,600,000,000,000.
D_hi: भारत के वर्षीय में 2020-21 के वर्षीय में

explanation_en: The answer is Option D which states that the GDP of India in the fiscal year 2020-21 was Rs. 266,600,000,000,000.

In the fiscal year 2020-21, India's GDP was Rs. 266,600,000,000.
question_en: What was the GDP of India during the year 2020-21?
